items.sentence: Girls don\'t wear skirts as often as they used to.

A taxi to the airport costs around thirty dollars.

I think that you and Tom could make a cute couple.
I think we are much better off than we used to be.
I think we should tell Tom that he has to do that.
My doctor told me that I shouldn\'t drive anymore.
Tom found his missing shoe under the coffee table.
Tom found that he actually liked working for Mary.
Tom found what he was looking for under the table.
Tom gave Mary a dirty look and then left the room.
Tom gets angry at the slightest hint of criticism.
Tom seems to be trying to impress the new manager.
Tom should do that the way Mary told him to do it.
Tom showed me the pictures he took at the wedding.
Tom should have known better than to believe Mary.

She promised that she would meet him after school.
She spends time with her grandmother every Sunday.
